Week 36 - Alison Noel

Sep 6, 2014

Last week was rather hectic, and now I am proud to post why: I am proud to introduce Alison Noel. My wife and I welcomed her into the world August 30th at 11:05am. After an amazing week she is starting to open her eyes and explore the world around her. I had her laying on her back on my legs while I played with a 50mm macro lens. She looked straight down the barrel and I snapped her first official portrait.
